text: visvasiccavare kantumuttumpeal avar parayum: nannal visvasiccirikkunnu ennâ€Œ. avar tam'mil taniccukantumuttumpeal (parasparam kurrappetuttikkeantâ€Œ) avar parayum: allahu ninnalkk velippetuttittanna karyannal ivarkk ninnal parannukeatukkukayanea ? ninnalute raksitavinre sannidhiyil avar ninnalkketiril at vecc n'yayavadam natattan venti. ninnalentan cintikkattat
